page.title: 18JOBS. METH. CHURCH TRUSTEES
page.content: {1834.}Farmer, Cordwainer(3), Blacksmith, Wheelwright, Labourer, Miner. { {1874.}Wheelwright(3), Shoemaker, Tailor, Farmer(3), Farm Bailiff(2), Mercantile Clerk(2), Gardener, Miner. { {1927.}Subpostmaster, Smallholder, Builder, Baker, Estate Labourer, Grocer & Baker, Engineer, Auctioneer, Draper, Clerk, Farmer, General Dealer. { {1954.}Draper, Clerk, Boot & Shoe Dealer, Married Woman(3), Farm Worker(2), Lorry Driver, Spinster(2), Miner(2), Bricklayer(2), Grocer, Farm Worker, Bricklayer's Apprentice. { {1985.}Postman, Farmer(2), Carpenter, Builder(2), Housewife(3), Garage Attendant, Factory worker(2), Nurseryman,
